++ Zones

Zones are areas on TheSystem that [Applications] use for StandardEstablishment and StandardMultiples.

Zones BringCloser the important [Configuration] areas for [Users] to HelpTheUser. Zones are specificed by the ApplicationPurpose.

    * [Games] use zones to organize GameComponentry.
    * All [Configuration] is in zones.
